author: gozer
msg: Don't increase the refcnt of the pnotes HV* twice, we
Remove unused struct member from modperl_interp_pool_t
PerlCleanupHandler are now registered with a subpool of $(r|c)->pool,
instead of $(r|c)->pool itself, ensuring they run _before_ any other
This way, pnotes can now be simply cleaned via a $(r|c)->pool cleanup,

author: amita
msg: TUSCANY-1815 Graph Merger improvement to allow secondary DataObjects without ChangeSummary to be treated for CREATE

author: tellison
msg: Growing an ArrayList should not call size() method
to be compatible with RI behavior.

author: baranda
msg: Applied patch for TOMAHAWK-777 (Datascroller breaks facets functionality when using trinidad default kit) Thanks to Leonardo Uribe

author: gozer
msg: PerlCleanupHandler are now registered with a subpool of $(r|c)->pool,
